pl.mazurmarcin.webcalculator.utils

Interface ServiceUtils

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceUtilsImpl

    public interface ServiceUtils
    Interface used to perform operations for service classes
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • createContactFormMessage

        ContactFormMessage createContactFormMessage(String senderEmail,
                                            String senderName,
                                            String messageText,
                                            String messageSubject)
        Creates and returns a ContactFormMessage with given email, name, text and subject.
        Parameters:
        senderEmail - The String containing the email of the sender
        senderName - The String containing the name of the sender
        messageText - The String containing the text of the message
        messageSubject - The String containing the subject of the message
        Returns:
        A ContactFormMessage representing the ContactFormMessage with given parameters

      • prepareHqlDependsOnListType

        String prepareHqlDependsOnListType(String hqlType,
                                   String listType)
        Returns the HQL Statement with given parameters.
        The hqlType should contain "FROM" word, the name of the entity and the space char as a last character of the string.
        Parameters:
        hqlType - The String containing the begging of the HQL
        listType - The String containing the type of the list
        Returns:
        A String representing the created HQL

      • createComment

        Comment createComment(String commentText,
                      ContactFormMessage contactFormMessage)
        Creates and returns the Comment with given text and associated ContactFormMessage.
        Parameters:
        commentText - The String containing the text of the Comment
        contactFormMessage - The ContactFormMessage associated with the Comment
        Returns:
        A Comment representing the Comment with given text and associated ContactFormMessage

      • changeIsActiveAndIsReadedStatus

        Changes the isActive and isReaded status of given ContactFormMessage
        Parameters:
        contactFormMessage - The ContactFormMessage object
